<Text>The Kuytun–Beitun Railway
1:
--------------------
Text: Kuytun–Beitun Railway:  The railway branches from the Northern Xinjiang Railway at Kuytun and heads north across the Junggar Basin to Beitun, near Altay, passing through Karamay, Urho, and Fuhai (Burultoqay).
Triplets:<Kuytun-Beitun Railway
2:
--------------------
Text: Kuytun–Beitun Railway:  The railway is 468.5 km in length The railway opened to freight traffic on December 29, 2009 and passenger traffic on June 1, 2011.
Triplets:<Kuytun-Beitun Railway
